title: Bartolomeu (João)
body: By decree of November 10, 1618, he was appointed as the chief engineer of the fortifications that were being built on this island at that time. Manuel Tomás, in book X of the Insulana, makes a very laudatory reference to him. (See Dictionary of Portuguese Architects and Engineers, vol. 2.1, page 34).

1618: Appointment as chief engineer of the fortifications
